channel.title: untagged on Luis Herrera

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hi there, A brief history of myself and my programming career. I studied system engineering(which is the Peruvian version of computer science). I started working with Java and I didn’t like it. It felt too verbose. Dealing with factories, interfaces, builders, DAOs, DTOs to just query a table didn’t feel right. I need to clarify that this wasn’t the language fault but at the time I was too junior to know it.
